Wayfarer [i](If you’ve spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} this turn, discover L’Or.)[/i]
Whenever Ardent Cartographer becomes tapped, you may mill two cards. If you’ve discovered L’Or,
you may surveil 2 instead.
notes:
GW:
 - Odd MVs
 - +1/+1 counters
RG:
 - two of each land type
 - wayfarer 5c
GU:
 - five or more alternate costs
 - fathom
BG:
 - mana value 3 or greater
 - graveyard (lands)
